productsJson.title: Split Pulley
productsJson.description: Split Pulley made out of cast iron GG25 is often used in Dal Mills, Rice Mills, Cement plants, Rolling mills

previous.title: Motor Shaft
previous.description: V-Belt Pulley made out of cast iron GG25 is often used in combination with wedge ropes for power transmission. Together they provide a high-speed power transmission solution that is resistant to slipping and misalignment.

next.title: Multi-Groove Straight Bore Pulley
next.description: Multi-Groove Straight Bore Pulley made out of cast iron G3000 is often used for transmission power in vehicles, mining equipment, processing equipment, textile machinery.
